EmailTemplate.subject: New SunPower Alliance Opportunity – {!Opportunity.Name} {!Campaign.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName},
Please find the Alliance {!Campaign.Name} opportunity information here [{!Opportunity.Name} with link].
Address: Contact Number/s: Email Address:
Based on our review of the customer’s solar needs and proposed location of the installation, this person constitutes a promising solar sales opportunity for you.
Alliance Opportunity Process:
1. Details of this opportunity are located at the OPPORTUNITIES Tab of the SunPower Partner Portal.This is the URL of the customer's satellite view ({!Opportunity.Address_URL__c}) for your convenience in assessing suitability during the initial stages of the evaluation. 2. Please contact this SunPower Alliance Opportunity within 48 hours and schedule a site visit accordingly (as required). 3. Once you have contacted the opportunity, please update the OPPORTUNITY STAGE Field (Contacted, Visit Completed, Contract Signed, Installation Completed, Opportunity Lost) in the SunPower Partner Portal- Opportunities Tab. 4. Upon completion of your interaction with this opportunity please complete the “Rate this Opportunity” survey.
For SalesForce usage or reporting questions, please contact customercare@sunpowercorp.com or call 1-800-786-7693. For Sales related questions, please contact your Regional Sales Manager.
Thank you.
The Alliance Team SunPower Corporation 1-877-779-7496 allianceprogram@sunpowercorp.com
